HOW TO INVEST WITH BRAIN

IT IS NOT WHAT OR WHERE, IT IS HOW TO INVEST.

LET'S TALK

We all know that the financial products available in the market are the same, what differentiates them is HOW TO INVEST. This is the true science. It is where we put OUR BRAIN, our INTUITION and our KNOW-HOW. To pave this way is what we, Brainvest, know how to do.

We have EXPERTISE and STRUCTURE to serve onshore and offshore. And especially WE ARE NOT CONFINED to any market. Throughout any portfolios history, we can change the allocation chosen. Before any recommendation on your portfolio, we must take the first step: GETTING TO KNOW YOU.

STEP1

MEET YOU

LEARN TO DEVELOP This part is the most important because we will understand, in detail, all your financial, personal and professional goals.

AND DURING THIS PROCESS, WE WILL ANALYZE:

Portfolio return expectations;

Risk aversion;

Main obstacles and special features such as issues related to liquidity, family succession, tax aspects, life expectancy, living standards, dreams and desires.

Step2

Brain services

Discover our solution

• Assessment, planning, allocation and monitoring of assets; • Access to exclusive products in differentiated asset classes; • Management in succession and tax planning; • Consolidation of assets (in Brazil and abroad, with different financial institutions with whom you and your family have your assets); • Payments, input and output controls, credit cards.

Step3

Portfolio composition

Studying the variables Regardless of your choice, Brainvest builds the best option for you.

  

Portfolio construction Now it is time to set your portfolio with the defined asset allocation to be proposed in relation to more specific classes and sub-classes of assets.

 

The image that best defines this step t is a tree in which we, Brainvest, alongside with you, will choose the top investments to compose your portfolio.

Step4

Develop and multiply

Evolution and adaptation Brainvest daily monitors your development, suggesting changes according to your needs, the market and your goals.

Our team for you There are numerous possibilities to be explored.
Talk to one of our partners (BRAINVEST TEAM) and make an appointment to understand how we can protect and preserve your today to provide your future.
We, at Brainvest, go beyond.

Por que somos diferentes

Confiança e Conhecimento
São características essenciais para se aconselhar financeiramente, uma vez que precisa haver uma conexão entre o portfólio de investimento e o seu cotidiano e suas metas.
Superar as expectativas
Mais importante do que estruturar uma proposta com boa performance, é garantir o atendimento das necessidades do cliente e também de sua família.
Você é o nosso foco
Os sócios da Brainvest têm exatamente este foco: analisar por completo a sua vida para sugerir o que é melhor para você.
